Title: Student Journey
Description: Avishi Dalmia shares her personal journey of moving to France and getting to HEC Paris - from VFS, CAF to personal anecdotes. Learn about her experience here.

Title: Connect with Students
Description: Chat with current HEC Paris students through the UniBuddy platform to ask questions and gain insights about programs, campus life and career opportunities.

Title: Applications Help & More
Description: Falguni Mahajan, M1 MiM at HEC Paris works as an educational consultant. Click here to see her recent interview at GMAT Club. Contact details can also be found there.

Title: Hindi Music Playlist
Description: A Hindi Bollywood music - with slow songs, party songs, music for a long drive and songs to cry to (you can write to me if you want a different language or genre)
